sentences.sContent: a paper carrying the front-page headline: ‘Space Aliens meet with President’
sentences.sCn: 头版报道题为“天外来客会见总统”的报纸

words.tran: 写标题的记者；头牌人物

trans.tranCn: 大标题；内容提要；栏外标题；头版头条新闻
trans.tranOther: the title of a newspaper report, which is printed in large letters above the report

trans.tranCn: 给…加标题；使成为注意中心；大力宣传
